participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and thoughtful, enjoys quiet activities and is passionate about gaming.
participant_1.background: My favorite people are my pets, Felix and Emmy. I like video games. I don't know much about my parents because they left me when I was young. I'm about to go off to college at a very liberal school soon. I live a quiet life and enjoy my own company.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and hardworking, values family and enjoys challenges.
participant_2.background: My favorite holiday is Thanksgiving because I love to spend time with my kids and show them my collection. I'm not sure I could pick just one, but building a house for my family was definitely one of the hardest things I've ever done. I went to a bar in San Francisco to celebrate my birthday with friends. I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake. She died when I was 18.

content.text: Hi! I like to play video games too!
Nice! What kind of games do you like?
I like lots of different types of games, but I really like playing RPGs.
RPGs are fun! I like playing them too.
Do you have a favorite RPG?
I really like the Elder Scrolls series.
Oh yeah, those are great games! I have played a few of them.
I've played all of them. They're so much fun!
They are. I love the open world and the freedom you have to explore.
Me too! That's one of the things I like most about them.
I'm looking forward to the next Elder Scrolls game.
Me too! It's been a long time since the last one.
I hope it's worth the wait.
